summary: Adds both male and female Uruk-Hai armour to the game, as well as one quest.
descriptionHtml:
Male and female Uruk-Hai cuirass, gauntlets and boots. No helmet, shield or sword as of yet.

This mod adds a quest that should automatically start upon installing the mod. During this quest you encounter enemies wearing the armour, and upon completion you gain the ability to forge it.
author: SXHarrasmentPanda
